title: Patching issue
body:
I keep getting patching issue. I restarted the client few times and no luck. Help, please?

Keep saying "_Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (error code 004)_. "

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [initiating a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
